author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FLASH FLOOD RISK CONTINUES OVER PORTIONS OF PUERTO RICO DUE TO  ONGOING HEAVY RAINS...
summary:
...FLASH FLOOD RISK CONTINUES OVER PORTIONS OF PUERTO RICO DUE TO  ONGOING HEAVY RAINS...
 As of 2:00 PM AST Wed Aug 14
 the center of Ernesto was located near 21.1, -68.0
 with movement NW at 16 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 989 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Ernesto (AT5/AL052024)
